/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and trucks moving along it, their colors muted under the bright sunlight.

On either side of the street, buildings rise up, their facades painted in shades of white and green. They stand tall and proud, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.

Power lines crisscross above the street, forming a complex web against the blue sky. These lines serve as a reminder of the city's modern infrastructure, a testament to human ingenuity.

The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. It's a typical day in Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity coexist.
